description.__old:
Values are:

 none - The caching mode for the disk is not enabled.
 readOnly - The caching mode for the disk is read only.
 readWrite - The caching mode for the disk is read and write.

 The default value for caching is none. For information about the caching options see: https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsazurestorage/2012/06/27/exploring-windows-azure-drives-disks-and-images/.
description.__new: The type of caching to enable for the disk.

diskSizeGB.description__added: The initial disk size in GB when creating new data disk.

description.__old:
If omitted, the default is "Standard_LRS". Values are:

 Standard_LRS - The data disk should use standard locally redundant storage.
 Premium_LRS - The data disk should use premium locally redundant storage.

description.__old:
Full path to the secret with or without version. Example https://mykeyvault.vault.azure.net/keys/testkey/6e34a81fef704045975661e297a4c053. or https://mykeyvault.vault.azure.net/keys/testkey. To be usable the following prerequisites must be met:

 The Batch Account has a System Assigned identity
 The account identity has been granted Key/Get, Key/Unwrap and Key/Wrap permissions
 The KeyVault has soft-delete and purge protection enabled
description.__new:
Full path to the secret with or without version. Example https://mykeyvault.vault.azure.net/keys/testkey/6e34a81fef704045975661e297a4c053. or https://mykeyvault.vault.azure.net/keys/testkey. To be usable the following prerequisites must be met:

The Batch Account has a System Assigned identity
The account identity has been granted Key/Get, Key/Unwrap and Key/Wrap permissions
The KeyVault has soft-delete and purge protection enabled

waitForSuccess.title__deleted: Whether the Batch service should wait for the start task to complete successfully (that is, to exit with exit code 0) before scheduling any tasks on the compute node.

containerSettings.title__deleted: The settings for the container under which the start task runs.

TaskContainerSettings.title__deleted: The container settings for a task.
TaskContainerSettings.description__added: The container settings for a task.

containerRunOptions.title__deleted: Additional options to the container create command.

imageName.title__deleted: The image to use to create the container in which the task will run.

registry.title__deleted: The private registry which contains the container image.

workingDirectory.title__deleted: A flag to indicate where the container task working directory is. The default is 'taskWorkingDirectory'.
workingDirectory.description__added: A flag to indicate where the container task working directory is. The default is 'taskWorkingDirectory'.

containerHostBatchBindMounts.title__deleted: The paths you want to mounted to container task.

TaskSchedulingPolicy.title__deleted: Specifies how tasks should be distributed across compute nodes.
TaskSchedulingPolicy.description__added: Specifies how tasks should be distributed across compute nodes.

nodeFillType.title__deleted: How tasks should be distributed across compute nodes.
nodeFillType.description__added: How tasks should be distributed across compute nodes.

mode.title__deleted:
Specifies the mode of an upgrade to virtual machines in the scale set.

Possible values are:

**Manual** - You control the application of updates to virtual machines in the scale set. You do this by using the manualUpgrade action.

**Automatic** - All virtual machines in the scale set are automatically updated at the same time.

**Rolling** - Scale set performs updates in batches with an optional pause time in between.
mode.description__added:
Specifies the mode of an upgrade to virtual machines in the scale set.

Possible values are:

**Manual** - You control the application of updates to virtual machines in the scale set. You do this by using the manualUpgrade action.

**Automatic** - All virtual machines in the scale set are automatically updated at the same time.

**Rolling** - Scale set performs updates in batches with an optional pause time in between.

automaticOSUpgradePolicy.title__deleted: Configuration parameters used for performing automatic OS Upgrade.

rollingUpgradePolicy.title__deleted: The configuration parameters used while performing a rolling upgrade.
rollingUpgradePolicy.description__added: The configuration parameters used while performing a rolling upgrade.

UserAccount.title__deleted: Properties used to create a user on an Azure Batch node.
UserAccount.description__added: Properties used to create a user on an Azure Batch node.

name.title__deleted: The name of the user account. Names can contain any Unicode characters up to a maximum length of 20.
name.description__added: The name of the user account. Names can contain any Unicode characters up to a maximum length of 20.

password.title__deleted: The password for the user account.
password.description__added: The password for the user account.

elevationLevel.title__deleted: The elevation level of the user.

description.__old: nonAdmin - The auto user is a standard user without elevated access. admin - The auto user is a user with elevated access and operates with full Administrator permissions. The default value is nonAdmin.
description.__new: The elevation level of the user.

linuxUserConfiguration.title__deleted: The Linux-specific user configuration for the user account.

windowsUserConfiguration.title__deleted: The Windows-specific user configuration for the user account.

UserIdentity.title__deleted: The definition of the user identity under which the task is run.

userName.title__deleted: The name of the user identity under which the task is run.

autoUser.title__deleted: The auto user under which the task is run.

securityEncryptionType.title__deleted: Specifies the EncryptionType of the managed disk. It is set to VMGuestStateOnly for encryption of just the VMGuestState blob, and NonPersistedTPM for not persisting firmware state in the VMGuestState blob. **Note**: It can be set for only Confidential VMs and required when using Confidential VMs.
securityEncryptionType.description__added: Specifies the EncryptionType of the managed disk. It is set to VMGuestStateOnly for encryption of just the VMGuestState blob, and NonPersistedTPM for not persisting firmware state in the VMGuestState blob. **Note**: It can be set for only Confidential VMs and required when using Confidential VMs.

VMExtension.title__deleted: The configuration for virtual machine extensions.
VMExtension.description__added: The configuration for virtual machine extensions.

name.title__deleted: The name of the virtual machine extension.
name.description__added: The name of the virtual machine extension.

publisher.title__deleted: The name of the extension handler publisher.
publisher.description__added: The name of the extension handler publisher.

settings.title__deleted: JSON formatted public settings for the extension.
settings.description__added: JSON formatted public settings for the extension.

description.__old: The extension can contain either protectedSettings or protectedSettingsFromKeyVault or no protected settings at all.
description.__new: The extension can contain either protectedSettings or protectedSettingsFromKeyVault or no protected settings at all.

VirtualMachineConfiguration.title__deleted: The configuration for compute nodes in a pool based on the Azure Virtual Machines infrastructure.
VirtualMachineConfiguration.description__added: The configuration for compute nodes in a pool based on the Azure Virtual Machines infrastructure.

imageReference.title__deleted: A reference to the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace Image or the custom Virtual Machine Image to use.
imageReference.description__added: A reference to an Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image or the Azure Image resource of a custom Virtual Machine. To get the list of all imageReferences verified by Azure Batch, see the 'List supported node agent SKUs' operation.

nodeAgentSkuId.title__deleted: The SKU of the Batch node agent to be provisioned on compute nodes in the pool.

windowsConfiguration.title__deleted: Windows operating system settings on the virtual machine.

dataDisks.title__deleted: The configuration for data disks attached to the compute nodes in the pool.

licenseType.title__deleted: The type of on-premises license to be used when deploying the operating system.

description.__old:
This only applies to images that contain the Windows operating system, and should only be used when you hold valid on-premises licenses for the nodes which will be deployed. If omitted, no on-premises licensing discount is applied. Values are:

 Windows_Server - The on-premises license is for Windows Server.
 Windows_Client - The on-premises license is for Windows Client.
description.__new:
This only applies to images that contain the Windows operating system, and should only be used when you hold valid on-premises licenses for the nodes which will be deployed. If omitted, no on-premises licensing discount is applied. Values are:

Windows_Server - The on-premises license is for Windows Server.
Windows_Client - The on-premises license is for Windows Client.

containerConfiguration.title__deleted: The container configuration for the pool.

diskEncryptionConfiguration.title__deleted: The disk encryption configuration for the pool.

nodePlacementConfiguration.title__deleted: The node placement configuration for the pool.

extensions.title__deleted: The virtual machine extension for the pool.

osDisk.title__deleted: Settings for the operating system disk of the Virtual Machine.

securityProfile.title__deleted: Specifies the security profile settings for the virtual machine or virtual machine scale set.
securityProfile.description__added: Specifies the security profile settings for the virtual machine or virtual machine scale set.

serviceArtifactReference.title__deleted: Specifies the service artifact reference id used to set same image version for all virtual machines in the scale set when using 'latest' image version.

WindowsConfiguration.title__deleted: Windows operating system settings to apply to the virtual machine.
WindowsConfiguration.description__added: Windows operating system settings to apply to the virtual machine.

enableAutomaticUpdates.title__deleted: Whether automatic updates are enabled on the virtual machine.

WindowsUserConfiguration.title__deleted: Properties used to create a user account on a Windows node.
WindowsUserConfiguration.description__added: Properties used to create a user account on a Windows node.
